entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023
